faqs.answer: Sector 10 benefits from reliable and consistent urban infrastructure managed by the local authorities. faqs.answer: Sector 10 enjoys excellent central connectivity. It is typically located a short drive away from both the Ambala Cantt Railway Station and the main Ambala City Bus Stand.
